attributes.action: Move to a better workstation position our colleague Monica
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to ask to the relevant authorities to support us by using all the measures to allocate our colleague Monica in a better workstation position, because she is very tired to look every day at the wall.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
